response.overview: Russia. 2006. Two young people support the ideas of National Socialism. They consider themselves skinheads, and they draw their ideological nourishment from paganism. One of them is more experienced, having a pagan name Ogneyar, helps the second to get to an abandoned village where the ideological inspirer of the Russian pagans, Dobroslav, lives. The second skinhead will also have to adopt a pagan name. On the way, they talk about what led them to nationalists and pagans, and try to explain their point of view to other people...
response.title: Ger
